info.task: navigate backwards to link in dropdown
info.title: Navigate backwards to a link in a dropdown in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToSecondLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the second link of the associated dropdown

user: With the reading cursor on a link in the first dropdown, navigate to the previous link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on a link in the first dropdown, navigate to the previous link.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
